attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We believe that party leaders, as candidates for Prime Minister are not suffiently understood through their political campaigns.

Our proposal is that candidates spend a week together prior to an election, screened in a "Big Brother" style social situation, helping to expose candidates' values and personality to the public and ultimately leading to a more informed leadership decision.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
